lead_paragraph: Former Spain striker Juan Antonio Pizzi has reached an agreement to coach South American champions Chile for the remainder of the 2018 World Cup qualifying campaign, the Chilean FA (ANFP) said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Pizzi Reaches Accord to Take Vacant Chile Job
headline.main: Pizzi Reaches Accord to Take Vacant Chile Job

snippet: Former Spain striker Juan Antonio Pizzi has reached an agreement to coach South American champions Chile for the remainder of the 2018 World Cup qualifying campaign, the Chilean FA (ANFP) said on Friday....
